name: Shakila Zafar
description: '''Shakila Sharma''' (born 28 February 1962), better known as '''Shakila Zafar''' is a Bangladeshi singer. Zafar's career began as a result of her appearance in the 1983 [[Bangladesh Television|BTV]] program ''[[Jodi Kichu Mone Na Koren]]'' where she performed an [[astrology]] themed song "Tula Rashir Meye".
